/* com.innobiz.orange.web.wf.dao.WfCdDDao.selectWfCdD */
SELECT * FROM (
SELECT
* FROM (SELECT N.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM (SELECT
T.CD_ID, T.CD_GRP_ID, T.CD_NM, T.RESC_ID, T.USE_YN, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM WF_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = T.RESC_ID AND LANG_TYP_CD = NVL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) AS CD_RESC_NM, T.SORT_ORDR,
FROM WF_CD_D T
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ORDER BY T.SORT_ORDR ASC
) N WHERE ROWNUM <= #{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} * #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC}) WHERE RNUM > (#{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} - 1) * #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} ) M ) M
